in_favor: Total net official development assistance for medical research and basic health sectors has significantly increased in recent years, primarily driven by the global response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Universal health coverage has seen a major share of ODA spent on basic health care from all donors more than doubled in real terms between 2015 and 2022.
Official development assistance for health has scaled up with a major share spent on COVID-19 control.
